name: Firegeist
movement: walks at a speed of 40 feet
description: The Firegeist embodies the essence of fire, appearing as a small, flickering elemental with an intense flame-like aura.
memorable: It inflicts fear and flame-based damage, making its enemies catch fire with its attacks.
goals: To instill fear and cause destruction using its fiery abilities.
relations: May be encountered alongside other fire-based elementals or as guardians of volcanic areas.
environment: Thrives in fiery or volcanic environments, becoming highly effective in bright light.
strengths: Immunity to fire and poison damage, high Dexterity and Wisdom grants it agility and perceptiveness.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Intelligence hinder physical combat and problem-solving, vulnerable to water.
attacks: Burning Slam deals bludgeoning and fire damage, can ignite flammable objects and creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Burning Terror causes fire damage and frightens its target with painful memories.
senses: Possesses passive perception of 15, allowing it to be highly aware of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Perception, enhancing its ability to notice threats.
additional_information: Elemental Nature allows it to go without air, food, or sleep.
Hide By Firelight ability gives it advantage on Stealth checks in fire.
Magical Light Sensitivity imposes disadvantages in areas of magical light.
Variable Illumination feature lets it control the light radius it emits.
Water Susceptibility causes cold damage when in contact with water.
test_queries: creature that ignites targets with attacks
monster that causes fear with burning memories
